headline: 2018 and the Internet: our predictions
keywords: Predictions, DDoS, Attacks, QUIC, IPv4, IPv6, Mobile, Security, TLS
description: At the end of 2016, I wrote a blog post with seven predictions for 2017. Let’s start by reviewing how I did. I’ll score myself with two points for being correct, one point for mostly right and zero for wrong. That’ll give me a maximum possible score of fourteen. Here goes...
